data.content:
Tính từ
kết vỏ; kết nang

verb
-lates; -lated; -lating
[+ obj] to show or express the main idea or quality of (something) in a brief way
a phrase that perfectly encapsulates [=sums up] my feelings about the day
The first song encapsulates [=captures] the mood of the whole album.
to completely cover (something) especially so that it will not touch anything else
The contaminated material should be encapsulated and removed.
